description: Variant identifier, or snp idenifier, or chr:pos. Keywords: chr:position, chr:pos, Variant, rsID, RS number, MarkerName, rs. Examples: rs12345, 20:45269867, 19:45411941:T:C, chr19:45411941, rs429358 (APOE ε4).
Genomic chromosome identifier. Keywords: CHR, Chrom, Chromosome. Examples: 1, 19, X, chr19, chrX.
Genomic coordinate location. Keywords: BP, POS, Base Pair, start, end. Examples: 45411941, 10240500:10248600 (range), build 37.
The allele associated with the effect or risk. Keywords: Effect Allele, Risk Allele, A1, EA. Examples: A, T, G, C, minor, major.
Frequency of the reported allele in the sample. Keywords: EAF, MAF, RAF, Frequency. Examples: 0.12, 12%, 0.005 (rare), 0.45.
The statistical significance of the association. Keywords: P, P-value, P_adj, FDR. Examples: 5.0E-08, 0.0012, 1.2 x 10^-5, 0.05.
The magnitude and direction of the association. Keywords: Beta, OR, HR, Estimate. Examples: Beta=0.25, OR=1.45, HR=1.12, Log(OR)=0.37.
